answers.answer: Hello and welcome.There are a couple of ways to get off the pills. Do you think you could taper down? Have you ever tried? Or cold turkey?That is quite a long time to be on them, so you will have some work ahead of you. Tell us what you were thinking, and a lot of good folks here can help you with alternative, suggestions, etc.

have you just tried stopping?  just throwing them out and not taking any more?have you ever stopped before?  it's not a huge amount, although it's been long term.i'm just curious if you've stopped before, and if so, what you felt..

I dont think cold turkey would be a good idea given your present state of health. You need to see a doctor and tell them what you are taking (everything) the shock to your body would not be good. Going cold turkey with heart failure and diabetes would not be good. You need a doctor not just a forum.
